attributes.action: TELL US WHY nothing involving politicians in this country, from the House of Lords right down to lack of kitchens in school, is not fit for purpose.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do for us is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, these days to be unable to identify what it is we want you to do for us.  We trust this is helpful.

The ONLY thing this government has been successful at, it seems, is the disbursement of monumental amounts of our taxpayer pounds to corrupt foreign governments around the world.  All because NOBODY in Westminster has the testicular fortitude to stand up for the people of this land.
